Documentation for extract¶

Contents

  • Documentation for extract
    • Syntax

This script will extract the file specified in it’s first argument using an appropriate extraction program. It supports the following formats…

  • .tar
  • .tar.bz2
  • .tar.gz
  • .tar.xz
  • .lzma
  • .bz2
  • .rar
  • .gz
  • .tar
  • .tbz2
  • .tgz
  • .zip
  • .Z
  • .7z
  • .xz
  • .exe

Syntax¶

"$1" . . . . absolute or relative path to the file to be extracted
